price: Wͻn mu bi wͻ hͻ a, wͻkasa tia wo wͻ (Soadaqa) akyεdeε no (nkyemuu) no ho. Sε yεma wͻn bi a na wͻn ani agye, na sε yɛamma wͻn bi nso a na wͻn bo afu.
arabic: وَمِنۡهُم مَّن يَلۡمِزُكَ فِي ٱلصَّدَقَٰتِ فَإِنۡ أُعۡطُواْ مِنۡهَا رَضُواْ وَإِن لَّمۡ يُعۡطَوۡاْ مِنۡهَآ إِذَا هُمۡ يَسۡخَطُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wamin'hum man yalmizuka fī al-ṣadaqāti fa-in uʿ'ṭū min'hā raḍū wa-in lam yuʿ'ṭaw min'hā idhā hum yaskhaṭūna
